mapper.update: insert into purchased_book_list (ID, SELL_BOOK_LIST_idx, Quantity, name,Price,Phone_number,Zip_code, Address_base, Address_Detail,To_Postman, Card_no, Flag) values ('1','1', '1',#{name},'10000', #{phoneNumber}, #{postalcode}, #{addressline1}, #{addressline2},#{phoneNumber},#{cardNumber},'0')
insert into sell_book_list (ID, ISBN, title, contents,sell_price,book_status,book_quantity,Flag) values (#{id},#{ISBN}, #{title},#{contents},#{usedPrice}, #{quality}, #{stock}, '0');
mapper.select: select book_info.title, book_info.author, purchased_book_list.quantity, purchased_book_list.price from book_info, purchased_book_list where purchased_book_list.id=#{userId} and purchased_book_list.sell_book_list_idx = book_info.isbn and purchased_book_list.flag='0'

select book_info.title, book_info.author, sell_book_list.book_quantity, sell_book_list.sell_price from book_info, sell_book_list where sell_book_list.id=#{userId} and sell_book_list.isbn = book_info.isbn and sell_book_list.flag='1'
